channel.title: Projects on Chaos
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chaos

item.title: LokSuraksha App
item.description:
Professional Summary

Developed LokSuraksha — a comprehensive citizen safety platform that empowers users to report community issues (like potholes, hazards, and safety concerns) using a mobile app with camera and GPS integration. The system features:

  • A React Native (Expo) mobile app for capturing and sending reports
  • A Node.js + Express backend API with secure authenticated admin controls
  • A React + Vite web admin dashboard to manage, filter, and visualize reports
  • Seamless data persistence via SQLite, and a shared TypeScript workspace for types & API clients

This end-to-end solution improves public issue reporting and tracking with offline support, responsive UI, and modular architecture.

item.title: DeLusion AI
item.description:
Project Overview

I was a core contributor to Delusion, a real-time, cross-media detection platform designed to protect identity, trust, and truth in the digital age. We engineered Delusion as the ultimate defense against the flood of AI-generated scams, deepfakes, and impersonations spreading rapidly across the web and various applications.

Key Features & Technical Highlights

Our solution provides instant scanning of images, video, audio, and user profiles, delivering clear risk warnings and trusted badges overlayed directly on content.

item.title: Project Shakti
item.description:
Project Shakti: Empowering Women’s Safety in Remote Areas

I’m excited to share my latest project - a comprehensive women’s safety app designed specifically for remote and rural areas where internet connectivity is limited.

The Problem

Women in remote areas face unique safety challenges with limited access to immediate help and weak digital infrastructure.

The Solution - Project Shakti

  • One-Tap SOS Alert - Emergency button sends GPS location via SMS to all saved contacts (no internet needed!)
  • Community Support System - Real-time chat connecting women for mutual support and safety tips
  • Smart Emergency Response - Quick access to Police (100), Women Helpline (1091), and Ambulance (108)
  • Location Sharing - Share real-time GPS coordinates with trusted contacts instantly
  • Safety Resources - Comprehensive safety tips and emergency helplines

Tech Stack

React Native | Expo | AsyncStorage | SMS API | Location Services | Linear Gradients

item.title: Smart Attendance System
item.description:
Overview

An AI-powered attendance management application that automatically marks student attendance using facial recognition through a live camera feed. This project is built using Python, Flask, OpenCV, and MediaPipe, offering a seamless, contactless attendance solution.

Key Features

  • Real-time facial recognition
  • Automatic attendance marking
  • Live camera feed processing
  • Contactless solution
  • High accuracy face detection and recognition

Technology Stack

  • Languages: Python
  • Framework: Flask
  • Computer Vision: OpenCV, MediaPipe
  • AI/ML: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning

Links

  • GitHub: BhaskPand/Smart-Attendance-System

item.title: Personal Portfolio Website
item.description:
Overview

Designed and developed a fully responsive personal portfolio using HTML and CSS to showcase my resume, projects and contact information. The project focuses on clean layout, user-friendly design, and performance.

Deployed the website using GitHub Pages for free and reliable hosting.

Key Features

  • Fully responsive design
  • Clean layout
  • User-friendly interface
  • High performance
  • Showcases resume, projects, and contact information

Technology Stack

  • Frontend: HTML, CSS
  • Deployment: GitHub Pages
  • Version Control: GitHub

Skills

HTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), GitHub

item.title: Smart Glasses For Visually Impaired
item.description:
Overview

Developed smart glasses for visually impaired individuals using ESP32, integrating AI-powered object detection, obstacle avoidance, and voice assistance. Implemented real-time image processing and text-to-speech conversion to enhance navigation and accessibility.

Key Features

  • AI-powered object detection
  • Obstacle avoidance system
  • Voice assistance for navigation
  • Real-time image processing
  • Text-to-speech conversion
  • Enhanced accessibility for visually impaired users

Technology Stack

  • Hardware: ESP32
  • AI/CV: Artificial Intelligence & Computer Vision
  • IoT: IoT & Voice Assistance
  • Other: Embedded Systems

Skills

Embedded Systems, Artificial Intelligence & Computer Vision, IoT & Voice Assistance, Team Leadership

item.title: RealMeta - Museum Painting Scanner
item.description:
Overview

RealMeta is a no-login, camera-based museum painting scanner. Point your phone at a painting, capture, and get instant information. Works offline for demos, supports anonymous analytics with consent, and includes a simple guided tour queue.

Features

  • No login — immediate use
  • Camera capture and scan-based lookup (pHash)
  • Rich info: text + audio (with TTS fallback)
  • Guided tour queue (Next / Clear)
  • Anonymous analytics with consent modal and session UUID
  • Offline-ready via Service Worker (pre-caches core assets)

Technology Stack

  • Backend: Flask, Python
  • Computer Vision: OpenCV
  • Frontend: JavaScript, HTML, CSS
  • ML: scikit-learn
  • Other: JSON, Text-to-Speech Synthesis, phash

Skills

Flask, Python (Programming Language), OpenCV, JSON, JavaScript, Text-to-Speech Synthesis, phash, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), scikit-learn

item.title: ExamsAI – Competitive Exams Hub
item.description:
Overview

Built a full-stack AI-integrated web application as part of the Full Stack Developer Assessment by Bhatiyani Astute Intelligence Pvt. Ltd.

Tech Stack

  • Frontend: React.js with MUI (Material UI)
  • Backend: Flask (Python), SQLite
  • Deployment: Vercel (frontend), Render (backend)
  • AI Integration: OpenAI GPT-3.5 API

Key Features

  • Add/delete and manage custom exams
  • Visual exam trends using charts
  • Generate personalized study plans using OpenAI
  • Clean UI/UX and mobile responsiveness
  • API environment configuration using .env

Learnings

  • Hands-on experience building and deploying full-stack applications
  • API integration and backend database management
  • Environment variable handling and Git workflow
  • Problem-solving and debugging in live deployment

Skills

React.js, MUI, Flask, SQLite, OpenAI, Render, Vercel
